inclusion.criterion: Female greater than or equal to 40 years
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Presenting to UM Breast Center and BWMC for breast imaging: screening or diagnostic
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: mammogram, breast ultrasound (US), breast MRI, stereotactic core needle biopsy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ultrasound core needle biopsy, MRI guided breast biopsy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients with a recent screening diagnosis of breast cancer < = 3months
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Patients presenting with mammogram findings with BIRADS of 0-6 < =3 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able to understand and the willingness to sign a written informed consent document
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with a personal history of stage 0-4 breast cancer >3months
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients who have known severe and/or uncontrolled medical or psychiatric conditions
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: or other conditions that could affect their participation in the study, or personal history of other malignancies
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients who are unfit or unable to comply with having breast imaging studies such as mammogram, ultrasound, and MRI or breast biopsy or with study procedures-blood draw
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with personal history of ovarian cancer or other cancers
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with a personal history of breast biopsy positive for atypical ductal hyperplasia (ADH), atypical lobular hyperplasia (ALH), lobular carcinoma in situ (LCIS)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has MDD, but is on anti-depressants and has a HAM-D score of 20. She does not have any other medical conditions that would affect her participation.
